question: Which of the following is an example of application of force?
option1: when a body at rest starts moving
option3: when moving body changes its direction
explanation: Force can be defined as an external effort in the form of push or pull which: (i) Produces or tries to produce motion in a resting body (ii) Stops or tries to stop a moving body (iii) Changes or tries to change the direction of motion of the body
